A pionner in developing software in Portugal, was the first company to release a commercial videogame in Portugal [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], [[Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure]], the first game completly produced and designed in Portugal, an important milestone for the Portuguese software industry <br>

A pionner in developing software in Portugal, was the first company to release a commercial videogame in that country [http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111], [[Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure]], the first game completly produced and designed there, making it an important milestone for the Portuguese software industry <br>
'''Ciberbit''' also worked in partnership with [[Microsoft TV]] to create multiplayer games for future TV devices. [http://www.microsoft.com/tv/content/Press/PressReleases/MSTVIndustrySupportPR.mspx]
